course.title: Animated Spirituality: Japanese Religion in Anime, Manga, and Film
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., at 1; nine film screenings Tu., 4-6pm; and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Helen Hardacre (East Asian Languages and Civilizations)
course.description: This course addresses the representation of religion in Japanese popular culture, with emphasis on anime, manga, and film. The course examines depictions of religious figures, themes, and human dilemmas in contemporary popular culture as a gateway to understanding the significance of religion in Japanese society and history.
